incidents.name: Errors adding new Magic IPsec tunnels via Cloudflare dashboard

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

Cloudflare is investigating issues with creating new Magic IPsec Tunnels in the Cloudflare dashboard.  This issue does not affect the operation of existing IPsec Tunnels that continue to function and pass traffic normally.
As a workaround, new IPsec tunnels can be created via API.

We are working to understand to mitigate this problem.  More updates to follow shortly.`

incidents.name: Cloudflare R2: Availability issues in Bangkok, Thailand

incident_updates.body:
Cloudflare investigated and resolved an R2 availability issue which potentially impacted multiple customers in Bangkok, Thailand.
The timeframe was between 4:20 and 16:04 UTC. Mitigations were applied and the issue was resolved accordingly.
